LanguageData.RedistHeat_MustExposeDuct: Orange colored square must be exposed.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_MustExposeHotSide: Hot side of the exhaust port must be exposed.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_MustExposeColdSide: Cold sides of the cooler must be exposed.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_MustPlaceBackSideOnCooler: Must place with grey arrow facing cooler.
